name: YES AND!
description:
YES AND! is a visual novel with a typing mechanic that allows the player to experience and explore the difficulties of saying no. Help Ellie stand up for herself and learn the importance of prioritizing her own needs.

Unfortunately, we didn't have enough time to finish the game on time, the second half should be completed in the following week! Consider following us to know when we release it!

---

This is a game jam submission for the May Day Mental Health Jam as the team BerryCats, made by Sarah and Laura! We didn't put our full names in the game's submission as to not doxx ourselves, but the jam's organizers can identify us with the team name.

Note: If the animations look laggy, turning on Hardware Acceleration in your browser settings usually helps.
